// Then use like: s("808:bd 808:sd").fast(2)

// Method 2: Direct sample mapping
// This creates a custom sample bank:

const localSamples = {
  bd: ['http://localhost:8000/tidal-drum-machines/RolandTR808/BD/BD0000.wav'],
  sd: ['http://localhost:8000/tidal-drum-machines/RolandTR808/SD/SD0000.wav'],
  lt: ['http://localhost:8000/tidal-drum-machines/RolandTR808/LT/LT0000.wav'],
  mt: ['http://localhost:8000/tidal-drum-machines/RolandTR808/MT/MT0000.wav'],
  ht: ['http://localhost:8000/tidal-drum-machines/RolandTR808/HT/HT0000.wav'],
  lc: ['http://localhost:8000/tidal-drum-machines/RolandTR808/LC/LC0000.wav'],
  mc: ['http://localhost:8000/tidal-drum-machines/RolandTR808/MC/MC0000.wav'],
  hc: ['http://localhost:8000/tidal-drum-machines/RolandTR808/HC/HC0000.wav'],
  rs: ['http://localhost:8000/tidal-drum-machines/RolandTR808/RS/RS0000.wav'],
  cl: ['http://localhost:8000/tidal-drum-machines/RolandTR808/CL/CL0000.wav'],
  ma: ['http://localhost:8000/tidal-drum-machines/RolandTR808/MA/MA0000.wav'],
  cp: ['http://localhost:8000/tidal-drum-machines/RolandTR808/CP/CP0000.wav'],
  cb: ['http://localhost:8000/tidal-drum-machines/RolandTR808/CB/CB0000.wav'],
  cy: ['http://localhost:8000/tidal-drum-machines/RolandTR808/CY/CY0000.wav'],
  oh: ['http://localhost:8000/tidal-drum-machines/RolandTR808/OH/OH0000.wav'],
  ch: ['http://localhost:8000/tidal-drum-machines/RolandTR808/CH/CH0000.wav'],
};

samples(localSamples);

// Now you can use: s("bd sd [cp hh*2]").fast(2)

// Method 3: Load multiple machines with prefixes
// This loads several popular drum machines:

await sampleFolder('tr808', 'http://localhost:8000/tidal-drum-machines/RolandTR808/')
await sampleFolder('tr909', 'http://localhost:8000/tidal-drum-machines/RolandTR909/')
await sampleFolder('tr707', 'http://localhost:8000/tidal-drum-machines/RolandTR707/')
await sampleFolder('linndrum', 'http://localhost:8000/tidal-drum-machines/LinndromLinnDrum/')

// Use like: s("tr808:bd tr909:sd tr707:cp linnDrum:oh").fast(2)
